ComicInfo.Summary: As the FBI continues its assault on Jackie Estacado, he must enlist the help of an unlikely ally to save himself. But will even THIS be enough to keep Jackie from the hands of the U.S. government? We don't know--Uncle Sam is a pretty tough opponent for ANYONE, even someone with the power of The Darkness...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 01:34:23. [Issue ID 118680]
